uk.org.lidalia.slf4jext

Class ConventionalLevelHierarchy

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.org.lidalia.slf4jext.ConventionalLevelHierarchy

  • public final class ConventionalLevelHierarchy
extends Object
    The conventional hierarchical notion of Levels, where info being enabled implies warn and error being enabled, is not a requirement of the SLF4J API. These constants are a shortcut if you wish to use traditional hierarchical setups.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<Level> DEBUG_LEVELS
      Levels that would be considered enabled in Log4J/Logback if a Logger was set to DEBUG.
